snippet: Mile-long trains carrying crude oil will likely keep chugging through North American cities even after a string of fiery disasters spurred safety officials to urge that railways send risky cargo along less populated routes....

headline.print_headline: Analysis: Oil Trains to Keep Rumbling Through North America's Cities
headline.main: Analysis: Oil Trains to Keep Rumbling Through North America's Cities

lead_paragraph: Mile-long trains carrying crude oil will likely keep chugging through North American cities even after a string of fiery disasters spurred safety officials to urge that railways send risky cargo along less populated routes.
